content: simply simon cowl materials 1 skein worsted weight yarn malibrigo rios was used in sample knitting needles - u s #6 4mm circular 16 or 24 your choice 1 needle to weave in ends 1 stitch marker abbreviations k knit sl1 slip one yo yarn over psso pass slipped stitch over k1 & yo gauge 22 stitches in 4 size 7 in height 22 in circumference directions cast on 116 join stitches to make a circle be careful not to twist your stitches place marker to indicate beginning of row row 1 knit row 2 purl row 3 knit row 4 *sl1 k1 yo psso* to end of row row 5 knit row 6 - 15 repeat row 4 &5 x 5 total of 6 repeats including row 4&5 row 16 - 19 knit row 20 - 25 repeat row 4 & 5 total of 3 repeats row 26 - 28 knit row 29 - 34 repeat row 4 &5 total of 3 repeats row 35 - 38 knit row 39 - 50 repeat row 4 & 5 total of 6 repeats row 51 purl row 52 knit bind off weave in ends enjoy i did an i- cord bind off but the last two row look great too if you want to try the i- cord bind off here are two youtube videos https //www youtube com/watch v=ygdvetbsyvm https //www youtube com/watch v=ddbuzzyhko
